Uses of Package
org.forgerock.openig.resource

Packages that use org.forgerock.openig.resource
org.forgerock.openig.config Performs dynamic configuration bootstrap, discovery and input/output functions. 
org.forgerock.openig.json Tranforms Java object model structures to and from JSON encoded values. 
org.forgerock.openig.resource Decouples representations of resources from underlying storage/access protocols. 
 

Classes in org.forgerock.openig.resource used by org.forgerock.openig.config
Representation
          Provides a representation of an object.
Resource
          Exposes methods to access an addressable resource.
ResourceException
          An exception that is thrown during resource operations.
